This app demonstrates:

1. Different ways to use nav_panel with various parameters:
   - Basic usage with just a title
   - Using the value parameter for programmatic selection
   - Adding icons using Font Awesome
   - A complete example with all parameters

2. Features included:
   - Interactive plots
   - Data tables
   - Date range selection
   - Multiple select inputs
   - Dark mode toggle
   - Sidebar layout
   - Cards
   - Font Awesome icons
   - Data filtering

3. Technical aspects:
   - Uses express mode
   - Proper reactive programming
   - DataFrame handling
   - Multiple render types (plot, table, text)
   - Layout management

To run this app, you'll need the following packages:
```
pip install shiny pandas numpy
```

The app demonstrates all the possible parameters of nav_panel:
- title: The display text for the navigation item
- value: A unique identifier for the panel
- icon: An optional icon to display with the navigation item

The app includes a variety of different panel types and layouts to showcase how nav_panel can be used in different contexts.
